title: Jhin is super bugged right now
body: His grenades bounce suuuuuper high in the air if the target gets far enough away and his ult bullets are invisible when he is in the fog of war. As far as I remember this is not how his abilities are supposed to be? I have found these issues on the hexakill gamemode and once on summoners rift. Anyone else seen it?

replies.body: The high bounce is super funny, I don't mind it. But yeah you could maybe consider it a bug (travel time becomes more then 4 times as much if the target travels some space at the right moment).
